StoredProcedureSqlServerv2k5.name: [GetAllProspects]
StoredProcedureSqlServerv2k5.body:
AS BEGIN
SET TRANSACTION ISOLATION LEVEL READ UNCOMMITTED
SELECT PR.ProspectId, PR.PersonId, PR.Recrui.ngOrganiza.onId, PR.Recrui.ngPersonId, PR.ProspectDisposi.onId, PR.Ac.vity, PR.Ac.vityDate, PR.CareerDecision, PR.Ini.alContactType, PR.ASVABDate, PR.Source, PR.NochildLe.BehindOp.n, PR.Suppression, PR.ContactTimeIndicator, PR.Note, PR.PACCreateDate, PR.Gradua.onYear, PR.LastUpdateUserId, PR.SubSta.onType, RP.RANK_CODE, PERSON.LAST_NAME as RecruiterLastName, PERSON.FIRST_NAME as RecruiterFirstName, PERSON.LEGAL_MIDDLE_NAME as RecruiterMiddleName, PR.NwaId, PR.AcpApplicantId, PR.TDQRemark, PR.PriorityCode, PR.SourceDual, PR.PPC, PR.ReferralSSN, PR.CategoryCode, PR.Interest, PR.ProgramType, PR.ProgramCode, PR.ReferOSODate, PR.Ini.alContactDate, PR.MonthWorkFor, PR.BirthDocumentCode, PR.DriverLicenseNumber, PR.DriverLicenseState, PR.DriverLicenseExp, PR.HasDriversLicense, PR.HasDrugUse, PR.HasMoralO.ense, PR.HasPhysicalProblems, PR.WaverInfo, PR.Expira.onDate, PR.DigitalCommunica.on FROM USMC.Prospect AS PR LEFT OUTER JOIN usmc.vwMcrissRecrui.ngPerson RP on (PR.Recrui.ngPersonId = RP.rowguid) LEFT OUTER JOIN usmc.vwMcrissPerson PERSON on (RP.RECRUITING_PERSON_ID=PERSON.PERSON_ID)
END
